item.title: Apprentice Product Manager (Level 2)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Merchant (Level 4)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 2)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Banker (Level 6)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Product Manager (Level 1)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 1)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Architect (Level 4)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Historian (Level 4)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Author (Level 7)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 4)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 5)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 2)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Collector (Level 5)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Socialite (Level 6)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Banker (Level 5)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 6)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 3)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Plumber (Level 3)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.
